languages.text: "Досточтимый технопровидец уже сутки не сходит с места, пребывая в трансе техномолитв..." {n}Псайкер испуганно вжимает голову в плечи.{/n} "Хотя я смел думать, что священному компилятору скорее можно помочь делом, осмотрев его члены... но кто я такой, дабы перечить сакральным знаниям {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Досточтимый технопровидец уже сутки не сходит с места, пребывая в трансе техномолитв..." {n}Псайкер испуганно вжимает голову в плечи.{/n} "Хотя я смел думать, что священному компилятору скорее можно помочь делом, осмотрев его члены... но кто я такой, дабы перечить сакральным знаниям {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g}?"

languages.text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"
languages.original_text: "Досточтимый технопровидец уже сутки не сходит с места, пребывая в трансе техномолитв..." {n}Псайкер испуганно вжимает голову в плечи.{/n} "Хотя я смел думать, что священному компилятору скорее можно помочь делом, осмотрев его члены... но кто я такой, дабы перечить сакральным знаниям {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Адептус Механикус{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

"The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}The psyker shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "Though I had the audacity to think the sacred decoder could rather use some practical help in the form of examining its parts... but who am I to question the sacred knowledge of the Adeptus Mechanicus?"

"The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}The psyker shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred decoder could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the sacred knowledge of the Adeptus Mechanicus?"

"The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}The psyker shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred decoder could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the sacred knowledge of the Adeptus Mechanicus?"

"The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

"The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

"The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

languages.text: «El estimado visioingeniero se encuentra en un estado de tecnoadoración y no se ha movido de su puesto en un día entero...». {n}Agacha la cabeza con timidez.{/n} «Tuve la osadía de creer que podría ayudar al sagrado compilador examinando sus partes... pero ¿quién soy yo para cuestionar el conocimiento secreto del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?».
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: «El estimado visioingeniero se encuentra en un estado de tecnoadoración y no se ha movido de su puesto en un día entero...». {n}Agacha la cabeza con timidez.{/n} «Tuve la osadía de creer que podría ayudar al sagrado compilador examinando sus partes... pero ¿quién soy yo para cuestionar el conocimiento secreto del {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?».

languages.text: 「崇高なる機関整備師は、技術祈願のためトランス状態にあり、もう1日、その場から微動だにしていません…」{n}男は、おずおずと頭を縮こまらせる。{/n}「神聖なコンパイラの一部を調べれば、もっと力になれるのではないかと向こう見ずに考えてしまいました…ですが、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}帝国技術局{/g}の秘伝の知識を疑うことなど、私にできましょうか？」
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: 「崇高なる機関整備師は、技術祈願のためトランス状態にあり、もう1日、その場から微動だにしていません…」{n}男は、おずおずと頭を縮こまらせる。{/n}「神聖なコンパイラの一部を調べれば、もっと力になれるのではないかと向こう見ずに考えてしまいました…ですが、{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}帝国技術局{/g}の秘伝の知識を疑うことなど、私にできましょうか？」

languages.text: “这位受人尊敬的引擎先知正处于技术祈祷的恍惚状态，已经一动不动一整天了……”{n}星语者胆怯地缩着脖子。{/n}“我大胆假设，如果能检查这台神圣编译器的各个零件，说不定会起到更好的效果……但我哪有资格质疑{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}机械修会{/g}的秘密知识呢？”
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: “这位受人尊敬的引擎先知正处于技术祈祷的恍惚状态，已经一动不动一整天了……”{n}星语者胆怯地缩着脖子。{/n}“我大胆假设，如果能检查这台神圣编译器的各个零件，说不定会起到更好的效果……但我哪有资格质疑{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}机械修会{/g}的秘密知识呢？”

languages.text: "Der ehrwürdige Maschinenseher befindet sich in einem Zustand der Tech-Gebetstrance und hat sich seit einem Tag nicht von der Stelle bewegt ... {n}Er zieht schüchtern den Kopf ein.{/n} "Ich war so verwegen, zu glauben, dem heiligen Compiler ließe sich besser helfen, indem man seine Teile untersucht ... doch wer bin ich, das geheimes Wissen des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} zu hinterfragen?"
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: "Der ehrwürdige Maschinenseher befindet sich in einem Zustand der Tech-Gebetstrance und hat sich seit einem Tag nicht von der Stelle bewegt ... {n}Er zieht schüchtern den Kopf ein.{/n} "Ich war so verwegen, zu glauben, dem heiligen Compiler ließe sich besser helfen, indem man seine Teile untersucht ... doch wer bin ich, das geheimes Wissen des {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} zu hinterfragen?"

languages.text: « Tel que vous le voyez, le vénérable technaugure se trouve dans un état de transe techno-incantatoire depuis plus de vingt-quatre heures... {n}précise-t-il avant de rentrer craintivement la tête dans ses épaules.{/n} Pour ma part, j'ai eu l'audace de songer que le compilateur sacré avait surtout besoin d'une inspection mécanique... mais qui suis-je pour remettre en question le savoir sacré de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} ? »
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"

traits.locale_text: « Tel que vous le voyez, le vénérable technaugure se trouve dans un état de transe techno-incantatoire depuis plus de vingt-quatre heures... {n}précise-t-il avant de rentrer craintivement la tête dans ses épaules.{/n} Pour ma part, j'ai eu l'audace de songer que le compilateur sacré avait surtout besoin d'une inspection mécanique... mais qui suis-je pour remettre en question le savoir sacré de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} ? »

languages.text: "Muhterem Mühedyum, şu anda bir tekno dua transı vaziyetinde ve bir gündür yerinden kımıldamadı..." {n}Utangaç bir şekilde başını omuzlarına gömüyor.{/n} "Kutsal derleyiciye parçalarını inceleyerek daha çok katkıda bulunabileceğimizi düşünme cüretini gösteriyorum ama... Ben kim oluyorum da {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}'un kutsal irfanını sorguluyorum?"
languages.original_text: "The esteemed Enginseer is in a state of tech-prayer trance and hasn't moved from the spot for a day now..." {n}He shrinks his head into his shoulders timidly.{/n} "I had the audacity to think the sacred compiler could be better helped by examining its parts... but who am I to question the secret knowledge of the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicusGlossary}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}?"
